text: Bill Bowman (May 26, 1946 â€“ August 15, 2020) was an American politician and businessman. He was a member of the North Dakota State Senate from 1990 until 2018. Bowman was born in Baker, Montana. He was a member of the Republican Party. Bowman died on August 15, 2020 in Bowman, North Dakota at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Businesspeople from Montana Category:Businesspeople from North Dakota Category:Politicians from Montana Category:Politicians from North Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Bill Bowman (American politician)
